text: Finland national football team is the national football team of Finland. == Player records == ===Most appearances=== Rank Player Caps Goals Career 1 Jari Litmanen 137 32 2 Sami Hyypiä 106 5 1992–2010 2 Jonatan Johansson 106 22 1996–2010 4 Ari Hjelm 100 20 1983–1996 5 Joonas Kolkka 98 11 1994–2010 6 Teemu Pukki 94 30 2009–present 7 Mikael Forssell 87 29 1999–2014 8 Erkka Petäjä 84 0 1983–1994 9 Tim Sparv 83 1 2009–present 10 Arto Tolsa 77 10 1964–1981 ===Top scorers=== Rank Player Goals Caps Ratio Career 1 Jari Litmanen 32 137 2 Teemu Pukki 30 94 2009–present 3 Mikael Forssell 29 87 1999–2014 4 Jonatan Johansson 22 106 1996–2010 5 Ari Hjelm 20 100 1983–1996 6 Mika-Matti Paatelainen 18 70 1986–2000 7 Verner Eklöf 17 32 1919–1927 8 Aulis Koponen 16 39 1924–1935 8 Gunnar Åström 16 44 1923–1937 10 Alexei Eremenko 14 57 2003–2013 ==References== Category:European national football teams Category:Football in Finland Category:National sports teams of Finland
